entries.text: In our publications library you can access all our publications and search by date and topic.

entries.text: We carry out long-term research into issues relevant to monetary and prudential policies and macroeconomic dynamics.

entries.title: Statistics - Reserve Bank of New Zealand - Te Pūtea Matua
entries.text: We publish daily statistics and insights that relate to our policy and regulatory responsibilities.

entries.title: Reserve Bank Bulletins - Te Pūtea Matua
entries.text: The Reserve Bank Bulletin canvasses a wide range of issues related to central banking, the financial system and the New Zealand economy.

entries.title: Statistics Release Calendar - Reserve Bank of New Zealand
entries.text: Data is released from 3pm daily. We cannot guarantee an exact publication time for tables and related documents to appear on the website.

entries.title: Our policy work for bank oversight - Reserve Bank of New Zealand
entries.text: An overview of our work to develop new policies, regulations, legislation and guidance for the regulation and supervision of New Zealand banks.

entries.title: Corporate governance policy for banks
entries.text: This page sets out the corporate governance policy for New Zealand-incorporated, registered banks.

entries.title: Speeches - Reserve Bank of New Zealand - Te Pūtea Matua
entries.text: Our staff meet and speak with a wide range of businesses, industry forums, community groups, schools and universities. See all our speeches here.

entries.text: This paper discusses some lessons from the crisis experience to date, and some analytical and policy challenges.

entries.text: Today we have published an updated implementation timeline for incoming changes to the prudential regulatory regime for deposit takers.

entries.text: The Reserve Bank announces today the following updates to the Overnight Reverse Repurchase Facility (ORRF). Published: 09 October 2023.

entries.title: New bank lending interest rate data to be published
entries.text: The New Credit Flows Survey collects data from registered banks on new lending during the month and its associated weighted average interest rates.

entries.title: Business Expectations Survey: June quarter results published
entries.text: Today marks the launch of Tara-ā-Umanga Business Expectations Survey (BES), with our publication of results for the June quarter (Table M15).

entries.title: Business Expectations Survey: Launch of regular publication set for ...
entries.text: On 21 May 2025 we will be launching the Tara-ā-Umanga Business Expectations Survey (BES), publishing results for the June quarter.

entries.title: Business expectations survey: Development update following ...
entries.text: The survey is currently in its experimental stages, with regular publication expected to start in May 2025.

entries.text: In my speech today I will outline why clear communication of our policy thinking is so important, and the forces that shape the way we communicate.
